trans-unit.source: Contains information about an operation parameter.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> class.
Represents the parameter name.
Gets or sets the attributes of the associated operation parameter.
trans-unit.target: Возвращает или задает атрибуты параметра связанной операции.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterAttributes> of the associated operation parameter.
Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo.Attributes*> property.
To be added.
Creates a shallow copy of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.OperationParameterInfo"></xref> instance.
The copy of the object.
Determines whether two <xref:System.Object> instances are equal.
The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current object.
if obj is equal, otherwise .
trans-unit.target: if obj is equal, otherwise .

trans-unit.source: Generates a number corresponding to the value of the object to support the use of a hash table.
trans-unit.target: Создает число, соответствующее значению объекта, для поддержки использования хэш-таблицы.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> representing the hash code value of the object.
